explains: n. <正式>不端行为；（冰球）对违反规则的处罚；管理不善，玩忽职守
v. 处理不当；行为不检（misconduct oneself）
wordGroup: willful misconduct 故意的不良行为 条约法律；渎职

sentences.en: But the fact that such a violation is "unintentional" does not excuse the misconduct.
sentences.cn: 这种违反行为是“无意的”，但这一事实不能成为不当行为的借口。

sentences.en: The company only dismisses its employees in cases of gross misconduct.
sentences.cn: 这家公司只有在雇员严重渎职时才予以解聘。

sentences.en: A psychologist was found guilty of serious professional misconduct yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天一名心理学家被判严重的失职罪。
